titocc.compiler

Class Assembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.Assembler

  • public class Assembler
extends java.lang.Object
    Formats and writes individual instructions to the output stream. Currently just outputs symbolic assembly language (.k91 format) but this could be changed to machine code (.b91).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Assembler(java.io.Writer writer)
      Constructs a new assembler object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLabel(java.lang.String label)
      Adds a label for the next instruction.
      void emit(java.lang.String instruction, java.lang.String operand)
      Emits an instruction with a single operand.
      void emit(java.lang.String instruction, java.lang.String operand1, java.lang.String operand2)
      Emits an instruction with two operands.
      void finish()
      Emits a "nop" instruction in the end if there is a label without a corresponding instruction.
      java.io.Writer getWriter()
      Returns the writer object for this Assembler.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        operand1 - First operand (usually register).
